section.heading: Statement of denial.
section.text: A person named in a filed statement of authority granting that person authority may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of denial that:

para.text: Provides the name of the limited liability company and the caption of the statement of authority to which the statement of denial pertains; and

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 303 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
